icmConfig.Title: [Beta] [Anomaly] - New Error trend for Organization Actions Completed in Station2 on ErrorHash - {{Identifier}}

name: [Beta] [Anomaly] - New Error trend for Organization Actions Completed in Station2
description: The following stack traces have been reported in last 60 mins

errorTrendCheckConfig.versionCountQuery: OrganizationActionCompletedParsed | where PreciseTimeStamp between (ago(6h) .. ago(3h)) | where ErrorHashMessage == {Identifier} | summarize errorCount= count() by RoleVersion = applicationVersion

diagnosticQueries.query: OrganizationActionCompletedParsed | where PreciseTimeStamp > ago(14d)| where Geo in ('JPN', 'LATAM', 'CAN', 'IND')| where ErrorHashMessage == {Identifier} | summarize by ErrorHashMessage, ErrorMessageTrim
diagnosticQueries.name: ErrorHashAndMessage
